caption: dailykos.com

data.message:
The Trump protest thing is getting scary. It was entirely predictable and the Trump supports are acting in a reprehensible way. But the protesters are also not blameless. I have never supported the hecklers veto and that is what they are trying to do. What Trump is saying is wrong. Interrupting Trump is wrong. A protest outside of the arena is fine, inside where you are trying to disrupt the political process is not fine. Reacting to that disruption with violence is also not fine. 

I would hope that the protesters would move outside the arena. By protesting inside all they do is escalate an already tense situation and give Trump supporters the ability to claim the high road "We were just trying to hold a peaceful rally and these thugs and instigators came here to cause violence." While I do not believe that is totally true, there is enough truth that is provides cover for the supporters. If the protests are outside the arena, then when the fights start the protesters can claim "we were engaged in a peaceful protest that was not trying to shut down the event, and we were attacked"

description: I almost missed it. I saw this photo of 2 young men holding a Trump sign at a Trump rally in my Facebook feed, which disappointed me, and I was ready to move on to better things, when I saw that the fella posting the photo (Jordan Ray Correll) had written
message: "But out of everything I saw [including Trump], the crowd was the worst part. I have never seen more hateful people in my life. Everyone was just filled with so much hatred. If a protester had a sign, even the peaceful ones, they would take the sign from them, rip it up, and throw it back at the protesters. Whenever a protester would get removed, the crowd would yell horrible things. Once, after a protester was removed, Trump said, "Where are these people coming from? Who are they?" A lady, sitting not 5 feet from me, said, "Well hopefully when you're president, you'll get rid of em all!" Get rid of them? Get rid of anyone who opposes Trump? It was sickening."
name: Trump Rally No Joking Matter

~orig.caption: dailykos.com
